summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Comptroller to advertise for sale negotiable bonds of the City of Seattle in the sum of Four Hundred Thousand Dollars ($400,000), authorized, ratified and voted at the general election held in the City of Seattle on the 8th day of March, 1910, under and by virtue of Ordinance No. 23219, approved February 1, 1910; and declaring an emergency.
